title: sheety.ai
introduction: Sheety.ai is a tool that helps you to generate formulas for your spreadsheets. It uses the power of AI to understand your problem and generate the right formula for you.
features: Store and access formulas from anywhere
targetPeople: Spreadsheet users, data analysts, business professionals
pricing: Free with limitations, subscription for unlimited access

faqs.question: What is sheety.ai?
faqs.answer: Sheety.ai is a tool that helps you to generate formulas for your spreadsheets. It uses the power of AI to understand your problem and generate the right formula for you.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can create a free account and start generating formulas. As an anonymous user, you are limited to 5 formulas. Create a free account to get unlimited formulas.

faqs.question: What platforms does sheety.ai support?
faqs.answer: Sheety.ai supports both Excel and Google Sheets.

faqs.question: Where is sheety.ai developed and hosted?
faqs.answer: Sheety.ai is developed and hosted in Switzerland.
